questions.question: Considering the overall condition, what is the predominant state of the screen protector?

Based on visual inspection, what seems to be the primary color of the phone's bezel?

Focusing on the fragmented pieces, what is the apparent material of the screen protector?
Observing the edges, what is the general form of the device's external frame?
From a visual perspective, what type of damage is prominently displayed on the screen protector?
Disregarding the damage, what is the basic shape of the visible screen area?

Describe the visual appearance of the pieces that the screen has broken into.
What is the visible design of the phone's outer edges?
What is the general color of the phone's border around the screen?
